name: To There and Back
description:
You use WASD to control the character. 

There is currently one building you can go in and one enemy you can interact with, and not much else. There is more planned to be added in the next few days.

I had so much fun making this game, and will be the last game I make on this 10 year old laptop. To next years Shenaijam, cheers!!

Love you Butterscotch Shenanigans!!
